column4: Hi I just changed from Ubuntu 8.10 to Jaunty and after that my Wifi Card with Atheros chipset is nowhere to be seen in iwconfig hardware->divers shows it activatet madwifi driver... still doesnt work... lspci finds this : Atheros Communications Inc. Atheros AR5001X+ Wireless Network Adapter
I just try to get my wifi working in ubuntu... my card is found in lspci, and systems->hardwaredrivers but not in iwconfig...
ah...thought you were asking how to crack a wifi network,foolish me
well,they might just work,no harm in trying,btw what happened?? wifi light on?
upgraded from 8.10 to 9.04 after that the card disapeared in iwconfig. the light is on and its found in lspci and under system drivers
ah but you cant see wifi networks?
btw is that nm-applet problem solved?? mine seems like its still down
no idea then,maybe its not properly detected or the drivers are not working properly
will try the web a little more and digg deeper in documentaions and bugtracker thanks anyway. Bye
no problem,hopefully youll get it solved
